00018 template <class ModelInterface> 
00019 class TSingleModelObserverBase: public CSingleModelObserverBase
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef CSingleModelObserverBase BaseClass;
00023        typedef ModelInterface ModelType;
00024 
00025        TSingleModelObserverBase();
00026

00031        virtual bool OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);

00040 template <class ModelInterface> 
00041 TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::TSingleModelObserverBase()
00042 {
00043        m_objectPtr = NULL;
00044 }
00045

00047 template <class ModelInterface>

00055 
00056 template <class ModelInterface> 
00057 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00058 {
00059        m_objectPtr = dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
00060        if ((m_objectPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
00061               return true;
00062        }
00063 
00064        BaseClass::EnsureModelDetached();
00065 
00066        return false;
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 template <class ModelInterface> 
00071 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00072 {
00073        if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
00074               // If model was correctly attached m_objectPtr cannot be NULL. OnDetach returns true only if model was correctly attached.
00075               I_ASSERT(m_objectPtr != NULL);
00076 
00077               m_objectPtr = NULL;
00078 
00079               return true;
00080        }
00081 
00082        return false;
00083 }
